title: Doomsayer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, select 3 players and guess their roles. If you guess all 3 correctly, they die.
- At night, instead of guessing, you may visit a player. You learn the faction of that player and the last number in their role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You can't guess the roles of Peasants

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4441
*Her gaze frightened even the most veteran soldier when she glanced around the room. Farmers hid their faces with the brim of their hat or the scruff of their shirt as she took the dirt path back to her shrine.*
